title: Digital Marketing SEO / SEM Specialist Needed
description:
We at Home Painters Toronto Inc. are an entrepreneurial residential painting company which has been in business for over 30 years.


In the last 8 years we have experienced tremendous growth and we are currently looking for a digital marketing specialist to manage our online prescence.


We are passionate about the client experience, and in love with the idea of making our client's dreams come true through the betterment of their home. Simply put, we paint homeowners dreams!


Our values include:


P ride


A ccountability


I nitiative


N o Egos


T eamwork


E volving


R espectful


S atisfaction


We are looking for a digital marketing SEO expert evolve and grow into something greater and look at HPT as your home for the future!


We have won numerous company awards including ranked on Canadian Business Profit 500 list three years in a row, a nominee for Ernst and Young Entrepreneur of the Year, HomeStars best in class 3 years in a row, and several more. So you MUST be willing to grow, adapt, be able to pivot quickly, and be a self starter.

### **Must Haves:**

* At least 3 years of experience managing digital marketing campaigns.
* Demonstrable experience leading and managing SEO/SEM, email, social media and/or display advertising campaigns.
* Experience with copy-writing and writing blog articles.
* Experience in optimizing landing pages and user funnels.
* Experience with website platforms such as WordPress and WP bakery plugin
* Experience using the Google Ads platform (Search, Display, Shopping, Video, Remarketing).
* Excellent communication skills with an ability to clearly explain complex ideas verbally and in writing.
* Strong attention to detail and project management skills.
* Works well under pressure and can manage multiple tasks under time constraints.
* Google Ads and Analytics Certifications.
* Facebook Ads Blueprint Certification.
* Extensive experience with Google Analytics, Google Webmaster Tools and Google Search Console.

**Nice to haves:**

* Graphics knowledge
* Wordpress + WP bakery plugin experience
* Experience running Facebook Ad campaigns using the Facebook Ad Manager / Power Editor.
* CRM experience such as Infusionsoft, Zoho
* Understanding of Google Tag Manager.

**Responsibilities:**
=====================

* Plan and execute all digital marketing, including SEO/SEM, email, social media and/or display advertising campaigns.
* A strategy for content marketing campaigns, including determining what to write about, proofreading the copy of writers and also occasionally write articles if needed.
* Create a strategy for email marketing campaigns, including writing email copy.
* Organize, build and maintain a social media presence.
* Track, monitor and ensure that campaigns are delivering against all KPIs by reporting on campaign performance.
* Execute conversion rate optimization (CRO) strategies with UX design, landing page design, a/b testing, multivariate testing, marketing automation and email marketing with successful results.
* Monitor industry changes and developments in digital marketing.
* Work closely with the owner to ensure the companies marketing plan is being executed efficiently and successfully.


In order to be considered for this position, please:


1) Send your resume


2) A cover letter stating " Why you think you will be a good fit at Home Painters Toronto? ".

title: Specialist, Email & Digital Marketing
description:
Blavity, Inc. is a venture-funded media and technology company, founded in 2014 around a simple idea: enable Black millennials to tell their own stories. Today, we are home to the largest network of platforms and lifestyle brands serving the multifaceted lives of Black millennials & Gen Z through original content, video, unique experiences, and product solutions. Blavity Inc. has evolved into a market leader for Black media, reaching 250 million users per month through our growing brand portfolio, including Blavity, Blavity360º, AfroTech, Talent Infusion, 21Ninety, Travel Noire, Home & Texture, and Blavity House Party. Our Blavity, Inc. employee community is composed of passionate, energetic, and culturally conscious individuals working together to deliver value to each other, the company, and our clients. We are always searching for new additions to our community that will help us continue to scale, contribute meaningfully to our culture, and advance our strategic direction.  

  

**Job Summary:**  

Blavity Inc. is looking for a Specialist, Email & Digital Marketing to play an integral role on the Audience Growth team. This hourly, full-time position is responsible for building and delivering marketing communications that engage customers and increase acquisition and retention. This role will run and execute email marketing campaigns focusing on email development, automation workflows, and A/B testing to optimize the customer journey.  

  

This position partners closely with the Editorial, Data Intelligence and Advertising Operations teams and is critical in developing the in-house email program and supporting digital efforts as it evolves. The ideal candidate will be a strategic thinker with strong attention to detail. This role will report directly to the Manager, Email Acquisition & Retention.  

  

**Responsibilities:**

* Produce and schedule content and assets into email service provider across several brands within specified timeframes
* Analyze and plan email content to engage users across specific audiences toward department and company goals
* Utilize graphic design tools to create high-quality and engaging media to be implemented in email
* Engage specific audiences though response emails by implementing conditional content and a range of segments
* Execute marketing and automated email campaigns to drive email messages through HTML/CSS, existing drag-and-drop templates, and automated campaigns
* Review calendars, manage email workflow tools, and support campaign kickoffs
* Request information proactively from Editorial and manage email timeline(s)
* Build emails and manage template library, ensuring that email best practices, mobile responsiveness, and rendering across all email clients and devices are in place
* Own email proofing, quality assurance, advanced scheduling, and final send/automation parameters
* Configure user-initiated sends and A/B deployment tests
* Collaborate with key stakeholders to provide guidance on best email practices and leverage technology to drive innovation and create engaging email content
* Work closely with Editorial and Client Services teams for content and email development processes
* Perform other duties and special projects assigned as needed

**Qualifications:*** Education: N/A
* Required Experience:
	+ Working knowledge of email marketing, including experience with email deployment tools
	+ Understanding of relational databases and data schema
* Preferred Experience:
	+ HTML/CSS coding for email
* Technologies:
	+ Google Suite, Asana, Microsoft Office, Data Analytics tools
* Additional Qualifications:
	+ Excellent attention to detail
	+ Interest in learning new platforms and programs
	+ Exemplary communication and organizational skills
	+ Desire to shape new processes and continuously optimize
	+ Knowledge of the regulatory requirements of email marketing (privacy regulations, CAN-SPAM, data management)

**Details:*** This is a fully remote role, U.S.- based role. Occasional travel may be required.
* Candidates must be authorized to work in the U.S.
* **Candidates must be available to work in 80% alignment with the Eastern Time Zone.**
* The hourly pay range for this role is $30.


To apply, please submit your resume and cover letter online at BlavityInc.com/Careers.

*Blavity is committed to creating a diverse environment free of discrimination and harassment, and building a team that represents a variety of backgrounds, perspectives, and skills.*

*Blavity is proud to be an equal opportunity employer. All qualified applicants will receive consideration for employment without regard to race, color, religion, gender, gender identity or expression, sexual orientation, national origin, genetics, disability, age, HIV Status, veteran status, or any other status protected by the laws or regulations in the locations where we operate.*

**Jazz SEO Description (160 characters limit)**


The Specialist, Email & Digital Marketing is responsible for developing emails to a range of audiences that meet documented business requirements.

title: DIGITAL MARKETING SPECIALIST
description:
**POSITION SUMMARY**  
The primary role of the Digital Marketing Specialist is to manage the flow of marketing information and communication from all digital channels through multiple sources, including team members at Da Vinci Medical as well as external marketing firms and partners. The Digital Marketing Specialist will also support the delivery and implementation of the organization’s marketing strategy, to ensure that all customer and community touch points are reflective of the brand’s image.

**ABOUT DAVINCI MEDICAL**  
We are Da Vinci Medical, we provide advanced healing technologies and represent industry-leading products and we are growing by the day. Our mission is to empower superhuman health through information & technology restoring humanity’s right to a longer life. We are disciplined and results-oriented our pursuit to see every team member reach their personal, professional, and financial goals through the work we do together. Our core values are the backbone of our business and guide our hiring process: we are committed, team orientated, and have integrity.

**PERFORMANCE OBJECTIVES**

* Manage and execute digital marketing campaigns across all online channels to drive customer acquisition including email, paid, social media campaigns, etc.
* Optimize Website exposure by analyzing search engine patterns to direct online placement of keywords (i.e. Google AdWords, etc.) or other content
* Assist with graphic design needs for marketing department including logos, flyers, brochures, ads
* Manage relationships with vendors for services related to marketing (e.g., email service providers)
* Analyze data and metrics to identify opportunities for improvement and creates reports and presentations for management
* Attends trade shows and community fairs and staffs the company booth
* Assists with and develops/outsources filming scripts and media production
* Performs other duties as assigned

**KEY COMPETENCIES**  
The requirements listed below are representative of the knowledge, skill, and/or ability required but are not necessarily all-inclusive.

* Extensive knowledge of Google AdWords, YouTube Advertising, Meta Business Manager and Advertising (FB/IG)
* Proficient in SEO strategies
* Experience with e-Commerce sales models and advertising strategies
* Highly proficient in MS Office Suite, Windows, Google Suite, Facebook, Instagram, HubSpot, or related software
* Experience successfully maintaining a positive attitude while working in a team environment with competing priorities
* Ability to maintain confidentiality with individual interactions with team members
* Outstanding organization and administrative accountability
* Strong written and verbal communication skills
* Ability to think individually as well as collaboratively when approaching personnel issues

**EDUCATION AND EXPERIENCE**

* Bachelor's Degree in Marketing, or Communications (Preferred)
* Minimum of (3) years related work experience
* Experience working with team members across multiple functional roles

**PHYSICAL REQUIREMENTS**

* Ability to spend prolonged periods of time standing, sitting, or walking
* Must be able to lift at least 25lbs
* Perform work with OSHA required PPE; Including COVID19 PPE.
* Reasonable accommodations may be made to enable individuals with disabilities to perform the essential requirements.

**BENEFITS**

* Paid Holidays
* PTO Program
* 401K
* Tuition Reimbursement
* Professional Training & Development Opportunities

**COMMITMENT TO DIVERSITY**

As an equal opportunity employer committed to meeting the needs of a multigenerational and multicultural workforce, DaVinci Medical recognizes that a diverse staff, reflective of our community, is an integral and welcome part of a successful and ethical business. We hire local talent at all levels regardless of race, color, religion, age, national origin, gender, gender identity, sexual orientation, or disability and actively foster inclusion in all forms both within our company and across interactions with clients, candidates, and partners.

**If this position caught your eye, send us your resume!** For best consideration, include the job title and source where you found this position in the subject line of your email to **careers @davincimedicalusa.com**. Already a DaVinci Medical candidate? Please connect directly with your recruiter to discuss this opportunity.

title: Digital Marketing Specialist
description:
Is career growth and development important to you? Join Carbon2Cobalt for an exciting opportunity to join a growing and successful e-commerce company that focuses on developing its talent! Carbon2Cobalt provides excellent benefits and competitive pay. Enjoy a work-life balance culture.

**Position Summary**

The Digital Marketing Specialist will assist in developing and implementing comprehensive marketing strategies to drive online traffic, generate conversions, grow the digital customer file, and enhance brand visibility. The position will work within various channels, analyzing performance metrics, and staying current with industry trends to optimize the overall digital marketing efforts.

This position will report directly to Sr. Marketing Manager.

**Responsibilities**

**Digital Strategy Development:**

* Identify target audiences and develop digital campaigns that engage, acquire, and convert.
* Collaborate with agency partners to monitor, analyze, and optimize ad spend results.
* Provide data-driven recommendations to enhance campaign effectiveness.

**Email and Social Media Marketing:**

* Plan and execute marketing campaigns via Email and Social Media to nurture leads and drive conversions.
* Analyze performance metrics of campaigns and implement improvements.

**SEO and SEM Auditing:**

* Conduct audits of SEO initiatives including keyword research, on-page optimization, and backlink strategies.
* Assist in the management of paid search campaigns to maximize return on investment.

**Content Marketing:**

* Identify areas requiring high-quality content. Make recommendations and collaborate with creative team in generating such content, necessary messaging, calls to action and product details.
* Collaborate with creative teams to ensure produced media aligns with stated requirements.

**Analytics and Reporting:**

* Utilize analytics tools to track and report on the performance of digital marketing initiatives and website metrics.
* Provide insights and recommendations for continuous improvement.
* Perform, and present ad hoc analysis as needed.

**Collaboration and Cross-Functional Support:**

* Work closely with internal and external teams to align digital marketing efforts with overall business objectives.
* Support the integration of digital marketing tools and techniques into business processes.

**Qualifications**

* Bachelor’s degree in marketing or related field, with professional experience considered in lieu of education; 2+ years of experience in a direct-to-consumer ecommerce role, managing budgets of $2m+.
* Certification in digital marketing platforms such as Google Analytics; prior experience with digital and general marketing KPIs.
* Experience in creating and delivering marketing materials for omnichannel retailers; proficient with ESP systems and digital ad platforms (Google, Microsoft, Meta, etc.).
* Intermediate user of MS Office Programs-Particularly Excel.
* Ability to work independently in a complex, ambiguous environment.
* Preferred: Affiliate marketing or marketplace experience; willingness to support events and stakeholder needs outside traditional business hours and across time zones.
* Bonus: Experience working with or for agency partners.

**Other**

* Positive, proactive attitude with the ability to work independently; adaptable to changing priorities with self-directed flexibility and versatility. Experience in apparel, retail, and/or direct marketing industries is a plus.
* Comfortable in a fast-paced, entrepreneurial environment; deadline-oriented with a proven track record of driving tasks to completion and thorough self-review skills.
* Strong team player, contributing to a positive working environment; exceptional oral and written communication skills, with a keen eye for detail and accuracy.
* Strong interpersonal skills, effective at managing relationships with internal stakeholders and external partners/vendors; must value team chemistry and facilitate positive interactions.
* Flexibility to work 8am-5pm PST, M-F, with additional availability to accommodate deadlines/time zone differences; occasional travel as needed for business.
* Ability to sit, work at a computer, and communicate clearly; occasional lifting of up to 25 lbs. The company may revise job functions at any time; Carbon2Cobalt is an “at-will” employer.

**Compensation is based on a variety of factors, candidate experience, qualifications, location as well as market and business considerations. Pay Range: $70,000 -$85,000.**

**We are an equal opportunity employer and welcome all qualified candidates to apply. We do not discriminate on the basis of race, color, religion, sex (including pregnancy, gender identity, and sexual orientation), national origin, age (40 or older), disability, or genetic information. We comply with all applicable laws governing employment practices and do not tolerate discrimination or harassment of any kind. We encourage diversity and inclusion in our workplace and are committed to creating a safe and respectful environment for all employees.**

Pay: $70,000.00 - $85,000.00 per year

* 401(k)
* 401(k) matching
* Dental insurance
* Employee discount
* Flexible schedule
* Flexible spending account
* Health insurance
* Life insurance
* Paid time off
* Vision insurance

* Monday to Friday

* How many years of experience do you have in proficient with ESP systems and digital ad platforms (Google, Microsoft, Meta, etc.).?

title: SEO Specialist
description:
GOBankingRates™ is unique in the digital marketing and media industry - we combine marketing, digital, content and fintech. Our performance based approach increases brand awareness and generates targeted audience engagement on our internal web properties and partner sites.



Learn More About What We Do

 **What's interesting about this role?**



We are seeking a SEO specialist to help grow organic search traffic and site authority for GOBankingRates.com. This role will focus on a wide range of SEO efforts, including keyword and title research, internal link optimization, technical improvements, link acquisition, and developing reporting & insights to maximize opportunity and impact. You will assist with running new tests and help report on results. The ideal candidate has a demonstrated history of results, is well-versed across all facets of SEO, and is an all-in team player who is a driven and passionate SEO expert.


**How Will You Make an Impact?**


* Executing monthly keyword research, competitive analysis, content audits, and other content planning and organizational efforts.
* Assist with building and optimizing the internal linking strategy to maximize rankings.
* Implement on-page optimizations in line with SEO best practices and keyword strategy.
* Support Technical SEO/ Site Health Initiatives.
* Monitor and build reporting for SEO traffic and keyword ranking performance.
* Support Outreach and Link Building tasks to build authoritative links to GOBankingRates.com
* Assist the team with other SEO-related efforts and projects on the roadmap.
* Creating Standard Operating Procedures to document current and new processes.
* Support ad-hoc optimization projects to improve rankings and visibility in SERPs.
* Research innovative SEO practices and stay up-to-date on all things SEO to help the team prepare for upcoming changes to technology and search.


**What Do You Bring to Us?**


* 2-3 years of prior SEO experience with proven results
* You have a well-rounded background in SEO, including keyword research, on-page optimization, off-site, and technical SEO.
* You have a strong grasp of SEO metrics and tools (SEMrush, Google Analytics, Google Search Console, Ahrefs, Screamingfrog, chatGPT, etc.).
* You are a data-driven decision-maker. You have excellent analytical capabilities and can translate data into action.
* Strong problem-solving, investigative research, critical thinking skills, and attention to detail.
* Passionate about SEO and proactive in staying up-to-date on all the latest trends and best practices.
* You are a structured thinker with a strong intuition on priorities & trade-offs. You can generate and rank-order multiple potential solutions.
* Ability to excel both independently and as part of a team.
* Some knowledge of (or interest in learning about) personal finance.
* Experience with Wordpress.
* Experience with basic HTML.
* Strong written and verbal communication skills.


**The salary range for this role is $65,000 - $75,000. Pay offered may vary within the posted range based on a number of factors including but not limited to job-related knowledge, skills, experience, and location.**


Benefits


* Competitive salary with excellent growth opportunity; we pride ourselves in having a team that exudes leadership, high initiative, creativity and passion.
* Awesome medical, dental and vision plans with heavy employer contribution
* Paid maternity leave and paternity leave programs
* Paid vacation, sick days and holidays
* Company funding for outside classes and conferences to help you improve your skills
* Contribution to student loan debt payments after the first year of employment

401(k) * - employees can start contributing immediately. After the first year, GOBankingRates matches your contribution up to 4% of your salary


A note about our new norm: The world has changed and we know it's important to adapt and to do our part to do what's best for our team. Our number one priority is to have our team feel safe, balanced and connected. We're committed to providing our teams with the best resources and tools to navigate this new virtual world that we're living in. We've also reinvented the ways in which we recognize, celebrate, and engage with each other to keep our culture strong!



Here's a peek into our world at GOBankingRates -


* Our teams are working remotely 100% for the foreseeable future. We're in the digital media space, so we're mobile and flexible!
	
		- Option to work from an office (if you need to get away!)
* Tools & resources are available to keep our team connected across North America. (JIRA, Trello, Slack, Zoom and so much more!)
* To keep our community engaged and connected, virtual team building events are held weekly and monthly.
* For wellness and balance, weekly virtual fitness classes such as yoga are available.
* To care for the local communities that we're a part of across the U.S our team members host socially distanced philanthropic events every quarter.
* And most importantly, we've committed to consistent and transparent communication to help us all stay informed, engaged and to keep us on our path to success and #greatness.


*We are an equal-opportunity employer, and all qualified applicants will receive consideration for employment without regard to race, color, religion, sex, national origin, disability status, protected veteran status, or any other characteristic protected by law.*

title: Digital Marketing Specialist
description:
**Digital Marketing Specialist**


**Summary**
===========


We are currently looking for a Digital Marketing Specialist to join our fast paced and highly-innovate team. You will develop strategies, configure ads, run tests, analyze campaign results, implement optimizations, and generate performance reports. The ideal candidate is well versed across the social media and digital ad universe and has a passion for connecting with customer audiences.


**Responsibilities Include**
============================


* Client Portfolio Management: Oversee and manage a portfolio of 40-50 clients, ensuring their digital marketing needs are met with high-quality strategies and campaigns tailored to each client's unique goals.
* Multi-Campaign Coordination: Execute and maintain multiple campaigns for each client across various digital channels, ensuring consistent performance and brand messaging.
* Strategic Development: Craft and refine digital marketing strategies for a diverse client base, leveraging industry best practices to drive campaign success and client satisfaction.
* Ad Configuration and Optimization: Set up and optimize ad campaigns across platforms, making data-driven adjustments to maximize return on investment for each client.
* Performance Analysis: Analyze and interpret complex campaign data across multiple clients and campaigns to identify trends, opportunities for improvement, and successful strategies that can be replicated.
* Client Reporting and Communication: Develop comprehensive performance reports for each client, providing insights and recommendations tailored to their objectives; maintain clear and proactive communication with clients regarding campaign performance.
* Continuous Improvement: Stay abreast of the latest digital marketing trends and tools. Work collaboratively with your Team Lead and across the department to learn and disseminate key learnings and best practices.

  

  

  

**Skills Include**
==================


* Foundational Marketing Knowledge: A strong understanding of digital marketing principles, strategies, and practices.
* Platform Proficiency: Familiarity with the use and best practices of various social media and digital advertising platforms.
* Analytical Skills: Ability to interpret and leverage data to make informed decisions. Comfort with analytics tools and Excel/Google Sheets is essential.
* Creative Thinking: A knack for creative thinking to develop engaging campaigns that resonate with our audience.
* Communication Skills: Excellent written and verbal communication skills, allowing you to create compelling ad copy and reports.
* Adaptability: Capacity to quickly adapt to new technologies and departmental processes.
* Time Management: Ability to manage multiple campaigns simultaneously and efficiently, ensuring all deadlines are met.
* Eagerness to Learn: A demonstrated willingness to learn new technical skills and processes, and to continuously seek knowledge to evolve as a seasoned digital marketer.
* Collaborative Nature: Ability to work in a team environment, sharing knowledge and adapting to collective goals and strategies.

title: Remote Online Chat Specialist (Entry Level)
description:
**Company Description**  

D1 Training is a place for the athlete. Beginner or pro, young or old, we define “athlete” as anyone dedicated to their sport or fitness. Our fitness training facility offers customized, state-of-the-art equipment, professional coaches, sports science-backed programs, and a supportive environment where all are welcome. You pick the goal, we help you get there!

 **Job Description**  

We're seeking an Online Chat Specialist to handle incoming customer support questions via live chat on businesses’ websites and social media accounts and candidate must possess the skills to answer inbound chats, emails, and/or correspondence from customers and properly address inquiries.

**Responsibilities**:

* Answers incoming customer live chats regarding website navigation issues, service questions, and general client concerns
* Evaluate customer interactions and elevate issues to Online Chat Manager when appropriate

title: Digital Marketing Associate
description:
**About You:**


You are interested in learning and personal development: past associates have gone on to become account leads at Matchnode, or run digital marketing for brands. That’s possible due to the foundational digital marketing knowledge learned in this role. Personal growth is a core value of ours, and something we measure regularly.


The ideal candidate will be early in their digital marketing career (1+ years experience), with experience across Google Analytics, Facebook Ads, Adwords, and other digital platforms.

 **About Matchnode:**


We’re Chicago’s premier paid social agency, with a leading client list and genuine differentiation in a crowded market. We are the Chicago Bulls’ digital advertising agency, and work across a wide array of industries from retail to financial services to news subscriptions.


Simply put, we’re making the ads that stop your thumb in your Facebook and Instagram feed. Matchnode was created by our Co-Founders Chris Madden and Brian Davidson in 2013. We’re self-funded, and have grown 250% year-over-year which is where you come in.


We’re looking for someone interested in expanding their career in digital advertising, strategy, and analytics. Expect to get hands-on experience operating ad accounts and delivering outstanding client service across multiple channels, platforms, and accounts.

 **We’d like you to show the following:**

* Strong interest in a career in Digital Marketing.
* Communication skills (written) and a positive attitude.
* Customer service focus.
* Ability to work both collaboratively and independently are a necessity.
* Able to successfully manage and prioritize multiple campaigns in a deadline-driven atmosphere.
* Strong analytical skills: the ability to gather, analyze, synthesize, summarize, and present data.
* Ability to manage multiple projects in a fast-paced environment and shift priorities quickly.
* Proficiency in Google Docs.
* Familiar with tracking, analytics, and reporting including Google Analytics.
* Extra points for those with an intense interest in business generally, as strategy ultimately is our highest value service offering.

 **What You’ll Be Doing:**

  

* Hands-on ad operation experience: you will support an account team in managing ad accounts.
* Attend client calls, outlining deliverables and summarizing takeaway action items to drive performance.
* Develop custom reports to review weekly with clients.

 **Perks and Benefits**

* Retirement Savings Plan
* Medical benefits
* Annual personal development/education stipend
* Health Savings Account
* Work from anywhere: we connect digitally every day and get together once a quarter with our team. The last 4 get-togethers have been in Austin TX, Scottsdale, AZ, Chicago, and Lake Tahoe!
* Company Sporting Season Tickets (Bulls, Blackhawks)
* Unlimited Vacation Policy
* Generous referral bonuses (for both new clients and new teammates)

title: Digital Marketing Strategist
description:
**ABOUT BRIGHTFIRE**

  

We’re the leading digital marketing provider for insurance agencies in the United States. We’re committed to providing our clients with customer service they love and solutions that deliver results. BrightFire offers insurance agency websites, social media marketing, reviews & reputation management, pay-per-click advertising, and local listings management.

  

To learn more about BrightFire, visit our website at www.brightfire.com.

 **ABOUT THE POSITION**

  

BrightFire is seeking a passionate full-time Digital Marketing Strategist to join our team. This entry-level position has a high level of visibility as you will be a customer-facing digital marketing consultant. You’ll be responsible for the onboarding and management of new clients for the the following digital marketing services: Social Media Marketing, Reviews & Reputation Management, and Local Listings Management services.

  

The ideal candidate for this role has digital marketing experience across multiple channels, a customer service or account management background, and exceptional communication skills.

  

This position is remote in USA only.

 **RESPONSIBILITIES & SKILLS**

  

General

  

* Act as the primary point of contact with clients during onboarding for our digital marketing services. This includes coordinating meetings that include additional team members such as visual designers or other Digital Marketing Strategists.
* Manage multiple, concurrent projects and all aspects of onboarding through completion and service launch.
* Conduct all client communications in a professional and timely manner to keep the projects on schedule and make sure clients are up-to-date on the status of their project.
* Monitor and support with timely communication internally throughout the onboarding process.
* Identify overall onboarding process improvements and share observations.

  



Local Listings Management Onboarding & Support

  

* Work with new customers to claim and brand their key aggregator and citation listings.
* Monitor and maintain key aggregator and citation listings.
* Remove duplicate aggregator and citation listings.

  



Reviews & Reputation Management Onboarding & Support

  

* Work with new customers to claim and brand their review network listings.
* Assist customers with Net Promoter Score (NPS) survey campaigns.
* Consult customers on how to best handle negative reviews.

  



Social Media Marketing Onboarding & Support

  

* Setup and customize client social media accounts.
* Analyze social media campaigns and make recommendations for changes.
* Setup content social media content calendar.
* Assist clients with custom social media posts or campaigns.

  


**QUALIFICATIONS**

  

* 1+ years of digital marketing experience.
* Strong interpersonal skills to work directly with clients.
* Project management and organizational skills.
* Comfortable with technology and learning new software.
* Excellent written and verbal communication skills.
* You can explain complex issues in simple terms.
* Must be personable and enjoy working in a client-facing role.
* A friendly person who genuinely loves helping people and solving problems.
* Ability to prioritize and manage multiple projects while paying attention to detail.
* Ability to work independently and in collaboration with others.
* Knowledge of common internet technologies.
* Takes ownership of projects, processes, and client satisfaction.
* Experienced with a remote environment.
* Experience with Google G Suite or Microsoft Office.

 **BENEFITS & PERKS**

  

* Competitive Salary
* Annual Performance Bonus
* Competitive Paid Time Off Policy
* Approximately 10 Paid Holidays Per Year + 2 Floating Holidays
* Retirement Plan 401k + 4% Company Matching
* Remote Work (USA Only)
* 100% Paid Employee Health Insurance
* Discounted Vision and Dental Insurance Available
* Flexible Work Schedules
* Provided A Company Laptop

  


*BrightFire is an equal opportunity employer and our team is the foundation of our company. The collective sum of the individual differences, life experiences, knowledge, inventiveness, innovation, self-expression, unique capabilities, and talent that our dedicated staff invests in their work represents a significant part of not only our culture, but our reputation and achievement as well.*

 *All aspects of employment including the decision to hire, promote, discipline, or discharge, will be based on merit, competence, performance, and business needs. We do not discriminate on the basis of race, color, religion, marital status, age, national origin, ancestry, physical or mental disability, medical condition, pregnancy, genetic information, gender, sexual orientation, gender identity or expression, veteran status, or any other status protected under federal, state, or local law. BrightFire will not tolerate discrimination or harassment based on any of these characteristics.*

title: Chat Support Associate
description:
Join our growing team at Vetcove, and help us transform how veterinarians buy the supplies they need to keep America's pets healthy. Vetcove's eCommerce and mobile platforms enable veterinary practices to compare and buy from all of their vendors in one place. Our community of more than 17,000 veterinary hospitals employs tens of thousands of veterinarians, and delivers care to many millions of animals every year across all 50 states. We’re a growing team on a mission to modernize the $50B+ animal health industry. Simply put, Vetcove helps veterinary organizations spend more time giving care, and less time shopping and comparing across vendors to supply their practices. Vetcove is a Y Combinator and venture-backed growth stage company with notable investors in Silicon Valley and NYC. We're looking for exceptionally talented and passionate people to join our growing team.

**About the Position**


The Support Associate is responsible for engaging with our vibrant community of veterinary professionals to support them in their critical purchasing decisions and processes through the use of the Vetcove platform.


Members of the support team work collaboratively to help provide our users an excellent experience on our platform through live chats, phone calls, emails, internal discussion boards, and platform demos This role plays a pivotal part in ensuring a positive and delightful day-to-day experience for every user leveraging the platform for their supply ordering needs.


The ideal candidate is a proactive self-starter who thrives in a fast-paced, team environment. This person will be excited by the challenge of supporting and growing a large community of thousands of passionate veterinary professionals through answering intercoms via our platform, troubleshooting, and working cross-functionally to help evolve our platform.


Experience in a relevant customer-facing role, as well as excellent written and verbal communication skills, are required. Knowledge of intercom and/or experience with other chat platforms is strongly preferred.


**What you'll do**


* Support existing Vetcove users by responding to user inquiries via live chat, email, and phone in a timely manner
* Troubleshoot issues quickly and explain scenarios/solutions in an easily digestible and effective manner
* Handle various daily and weekly admin responsibilities, such as proactive account management, item issue reports, item reviews, credit approvals, and more
* Work cross-functionally to provide our engineering, partner, and corporate teams with information on feature requests and recommendations for enhancements to our tools
* Work with vendor and industry partners to streamline communication and alerts between systems
* Help to continuously develop and expand processes in order to streamline support workflows

**You should have**

* 1 year of relevant, customer facing work experience
* 2 Year Associates Degree or 4 Year College Degree
* Excellent written and verbal communication skills
* Experience in chat support preferred
* Patience and compassion when handling difficult situations
* Ability to adapt quickly and manage many concurrent responsibilities
* A strong desire to learn and help our customers succeed
* A positive attitude and one-for-all team mentality and excellent collaboration skills
* Tech/start-up work experience is a plus but not required

**Benefits**
------------

* 100% remote within the USA
* Medical, Dental, and Vision Insurance
* Automatic 401k contribution
* Employee referral program
* At home office set up
* Bi-annual company retreats
* Open vacation policy
* Equity
* Monthly team events


Please note we are unable to sponsor work visas at this time.


**Attention all job seekers!** We want to ensure that you’re well-informed about a serious matter affecting the job market. It has come to our attention that scammers are operating in the industry, impersonating employees and attempting to deceive savvy applicants like you. Here’s what you need to know:

* Our job listings are exclusively available on official sites (our careers page, LinkedIn, BuiltIn, and Indeed). Be cautious of other sources claiming to represent us or any organization that you’re interested in. Stay on the lookout!
* Authentic communications from our company will only come through verified email addresses and phone numbers. If you receive unexpected messages or calls, exercise caution and verify their authenticity. Don’t let scammers catch you off guard!
* It's essential to independently verify the legitimacy of any job postings you come across. Visit our official careers page to confirm the validity of any openings. Stay proactive and protect yourself!
* Remember that during the application process, we will ***never*** request sensitive personal or financial information from you. Be wary of anyone asking for such information. Keep your personal data secure!
* If you suspect any fraudulent activity or encounter suspicious individuals, please report it immediately to our recruiting department. By working together, we can combat these scams and keep the job market safer for everyone.


We understand the importance of your job search and want to ensure your experience is positive and secure. Always exercise caution and stay scam-smart!


Vetcove is an equal opportunity employer and is committed to creating a diverse and inclusive workplace. We welcome applicants from all backgrounds, regardless of race, color, religion, sex, national origin, age, disability, veteran status, sexual orientation, gender identity, or any other protected status. We are dedicated to providing a work environment free from discrimination, harassment, and retaliation. It is our policy to provide equal employment opportunity to all applicants in accordance with all applicable laws and regulations. If you require accommodations during the application or interview process, please let us know and we will make every effort to accommodate your needs.

title: Digital Marketing Specialist
description:
Media Cause is an award winning, mission-driven marketing and creative agency that helps nonprofits grow and accelerate their impact. We take a people-first approach to developing powerful creative, scalable growth strategies, and targeted communications that connect with individuals across their entire supporter journey: from awareness and recruitment to fundraising and advocacy, and every touchpoint in-between.

  

  

Media Cause consists of 60 full-time employees along with a network of talented consultants. We have offices in Boston, Washington DC, Atlanta and San Francisco as well as team members who work remotely permanently. Our agency has grown in size every year since our founding, landing on the Inc. 5000 list for the fastest growing private companies in America three times. We have built a strong business although Impact is our North Star. In addition to winning 14 awards for our client work in 2020, Media Cause was honored by Inc. Magazine with a Best In Business Gold Award (https://mediacause.org/media-cause-wins-gold-from-inc-best-in-business-awards/) for our positive impact on our community, our industry and society as a whole.


Media Cause is looking for an Digital Marketing Strategist to help accelerate the growth and impact of organizations doing good in the world by creating digital marketing and communications strategies for nonprofit and social good organizations.


**Who You Are:**


The ideal candidate has 4-5 years of digital marketing experience across non-profits and digital marketing industries. Bonus points for prior agency experience.


We're looking for people with a passion for driving meaningful results for clients, a hunger to continue learning in the ever changing digital world, the ability to problem solve to overcome any challenge, a passion for helping teammates succeed, and a strong desire to change the world.


**Skills & Experience Required**


* Experience in a range of digital marketing areas (not all required but looking for someone with a variety of digital marketing chops):
	+ Social Media Community Management
	+ Paid Social Media Ad management: Facebook and Twitter
	+ Email marketing strategy and copywriting
	+ Content marketing strategy and execution
	+ A/B testing and cross channel optimization experience
	+ SEO
	+ Google Analytics dashboard creation and insight reporting
	+ Ad Grant management
* Excellent verbal and written communication skills
* Experience managing managing multiple clients at once in a fast paced environment
* Track record of thinking outside the box for innovative ways for nonprofits to use all social platforms to achieve their goals.
* An optimistic dreamer who executes efficiently with a positive can do attitude
* Hold yourself personally accountable and responsible for the work of your team, and expect others to do the same
* Genuinely be driven by a passion to make a difference, not just make money. Although we're here to help you do both.


**Company Perks & Culture**


* Family first work environment with flexible work from home options to accommodate personal obligations
* Robust health, dental, and vision benefit plans for you and yours
* 401k & retirement planning
* Agency-wide profit sharing
* Unlimited personal time off (with an enforced 3 week minimum every year)
* Quarterly mental health Fridays to reset and recharge
* Flexible remote work: We're open to candidates located anywhere in the US and support work getting done wherever it works best for the employee
* $150/month health & wellness stipend to strengthen your body and/or mind
* $1,000/year individual professional development stipend to cover any education/training that you want to pursue to grow in your role (or as a human!)
* Agency commitment to building and supporting a diverse, equitable, and inclusive agency (https://mediacause.org/dei-at-media-cause/) (and we hold ourselves accountable)
* Transparent & equitable career growth opportunities: Clear path for advancement and opportunity for anyone to raise their hand for promotion every 6 months
* The ability to work with genuinely fantastic humans who care deeply about the work we do and each other
* Yearly donations made to employees nonprofit of choice to celebrate their Media Cause work anniversaries
* A culture of volunteering and giving back to the communities we work in and to the issues we care about around the world (quarterly office volunteer days will return after COVID)


This is a salaried role commensurate with experience. Media Cause is committed to hiring individuals who are traditionally underrepresented in the field of marketing. We strongly encourage all qualified people to apply.

title: Digital Marketer
description:
We are looking for a result oriented digital marketing specialist who will be responsible for developing and executing comprehensive digital marketing strategies to promote our web and app development services, increase brand awareness, and generate leads. You will leverage your expertise in digital marketing tactics and technologies to drive traffic, engagement, and conversions across various online channels. This role requires a strategic thinker with a passion for technology and a proven track record of delivering results in a fast-paced environment.

Roles and Responsibilities:

1. Develop and implement digital marketing strategies to promote company's services and drive leads through various channels, including SEO, SEM, social media, email marketing, content marketing, and influencer partnerships.

2. Collaborate with business development team to understand target audience needs, define buyer personas, and develop targeted messaging and content to effectively reach and engage prospects.

3. Manage company’s online presence, including website optimization, content creation, and social media management, to enhance brand visibility and credibility in the mobile app development industry.

4. Utilize marketing automation tools and CRM systems to streamline lead generation, lead nurturing, and lead tracking processes, and optimize conversion rates throughout the sales funnel.

5. Analyze key performance metrics, such as website traffic, conversion rates, lead quality, and ROI using Google Analytics and Search Console to measure the effectiveness of digital marketing campaigns and make data-driven optimizations to improve results.

6. Stay up to date with the latest trends, best practices, and technologies in digital marketing, web, and mobile app development, and implement innovative strategies to differentiate our company from competitors.

7. Lead and mentor a team of digital marketing specialists, providing guidance, support, and professional development opportunities to drive team performance and achieve marketing objectives.

8. Collaborate with cross-functional teams, including design, development, and project management, to ensure alignment of marketing initiatives with business goals and project timelines.

Requirements:

1. Bachelor’s degree in marketing, Business Administration, Communications, or related field. Master's degree preferred.

2. 4+ years of experience in digital marketing, with a focus on promoting technology products or services.

3. Proven track record of developing and executing successful digital marketing strategies that drive lead generation, customer acquisition, and revenue growth.

4. Expertise in digital marketing channels and tactics, including SEO, SEM, social media advertising, email marketing, content marketing, and influencer partnerships.

5. Strong analytical skills with the ability to interpret data, generate insights, and make data-driven decisions to optimize marketing performance.

6. Excellent communication and collaboration skills, with the ability to work cross-functionally with sales, development, and other teams to achieve common goals.

7. Creative thinking and problem-solving abilities, with a passion for innovation and continuous improvement in digital marketing strategies.

8. Experience with marketing automation platforms like SEMrush and CRM systems like ZOHO is preferred.

9. Knowledge of web and mobile app development processes, technologies, and industry trends is a plus

title: SEO Specialist
description:

Roles and Responsibilities:

* Conduct keyword research to identify high-volume, relevant keywords to target
* Perform on-page optimization by optimizing title tags, meta descriptions, content, etc.
* Build high-quality backlinks through outreach, guest posting, etc.
* Monitor website analytics and traffic regularly, and make recommendations to improve SEO
* Stay up-to-date with SEO best practices and search algorithm updates
* Collaborate with marketing, product, and engineering teams to alignment on SEO goals
* Generate SEO reports regularly to demonstrate progress and ROI

Skills and Qualifications:

* 1+ years experience in an SEO role
* In-depth knowledge of SEO best practices and search ranking factors
* Experience with keyword research and competitive analysis
* Strong analytical skills and data-driven mindset

We are seeking a dynamic and results-driven Sales and Marketing Specialist to join our team. The ideal candidate will be responsible for developing and implementing sales and marketing strategies to drive business growth and enhance brand awareness. This role requires a combination of creativity, strategic thinking, and excellent communication skills.

description:
**DIGITAL MARKETING EXECUTIVE JD**

**Lead Generation Specialist (Digital marketing)**

Min experience – 2 years

Job location – work from office

Duration – 6 days in week

Profile – Full time

Salary – Between 20,000 – 25,000 per month

Incentive – As per policy

**Job details:**

A Digital Marketing Executive plays a crucial role in planning, executing, and managing online marketing campaigns for a company or client. The specific job details may vary depending on the organization, industry, and the scale of their digital marketing efforts. Here is a general overview of the typical responsibilities and qualifications for a Digital Marketing Executive:

**Job Responsibilities:**

1. **Campaign Planning and Execution:**

· Develop and implement digital marketing strategies to achieve business goals.

· Plan and execute online marketing campaigns across various channels such as social media, email, search engine optimization (SEO), and pay-per-click (PPC) advertising.

2. **Content Marketing:**

· Create and optimize content for digital platforms, including websites, blogs, and social media.

· Develop and manage content calendars to ensure a consistent flow of content.

3. **Social Media Management:**

· Manage and grow the company's presence on social media platforms.

· Create and curate engaging content, and interact with the audience to build brand awareness.

· Tele-calling for lead generation

· Converting into f2f meeting

· Handle all social;

4. **SEO and SEM:**

· Optimize website content for search engines to improve organic visibility (SEO).

· Implement and manage paid advertising campaigns on platforms like Google Ads (SEM).

5. **Email Marketing:**

· Develop and execute email marketing campaigns to nurture leads and retain customers.

· Monitor and analyze email campaign performance and make data-driven improvements.

6. **Analytics and Reporting:**

· Use analytics tools to track and measure the performance of digital marketing campaigns.

· Prepare regular reports, analyze data, and provide insights to improve campaign effectiveness.

7. **Budget Management:**

· Manage budgets for various digital marketing channels and campaigns.

· Optimize spending to maximize ROI and achieve marketing objectives.

8. **Market Research:**

· Stay updated on industry trends, competitor activities, and emerging technologies.

· Conduct market research to identify opportunities for growth and improvement.

**Qualifications and Skills:**

1. Bachelor's degree in Marketing, Business, or a related field.

2. Proven experience in digital marketing, with a focus on campaign management.

3. Familiarity with various digital marketing channels and tools.

4. Strong analytical and problem-solving skills.

5. Excellent communication and interpersonal skills.

6. Creativity and the ability to think strategically.

7. Proficiency in using digital marketing tools such as Google Analytics, SEO tools, and social media management platforms.

8. Up-to-date knowledge of the latest trends and best practices in digital marketing.

Digital Marketing Executives often work closely with other departments, such as sales, design, and IT, to ensure a cohesive and effective digital marketing strategy. The role is dynamic and requires adaptability to the rapidly changing landscape of digital marketing

www.success-tours.com

**Job Description:** The candidate will develop, implement, and manage marketing campaigns promoting the organization's products and services. The candidate will majorly enhance brand awareness, drive web traffic, and acquire leads/customers. Are you innovative and passionate about current trends and creating digital marketing campaigns. Success Tours is looking to hire a digital marketing manager to support the marketing team in effectively promoting its message across all digital channels. On a daily basis, to manage social media, including Facebook, Twitter, and Instagram, and create email blast campaigns to target key customers. Responsibilities to copywriters, content creators, and other members of the marketing team, and stay up to date on the latest social media trends.

**Key Responsibilities:**

● Develop marketing strategies that align with the organization's business goals

● Manage and execute campaigns across various digital channels, including email, social media, search engines, and display advertising

● Measure and report on the performance of digital marketing campaigns, and assess against goals (ROI and KPIs)

● Conduct market research and analyze trends to identify new opportunities and improve campaign performance

● Collaborate with cross-functional teams, including creative, content, and web development, to produce engaging content and optimize user experience

● Plan and execute all digital marketing, including SEO/SEM, marketing database, email, social media and display advertising campaigns

● Design, build and maintain our social media presence

● Measure and report performance of all digital marketing campaigns, and assess against goals (ROI and KPIs)

● Brainstorm new and creative growth strategies

Collaborate with internal teams to create landing pages and optimize user experience

● Utilize strong analytical ability to evaluate end-to-end customer experience across multiple channels and customer touch points

● Maintain consistent brand messaging across all social channels

● Identify, analyze, and measure trends and content to assess how well it’s performing and optimize user experience

● Create and maintain an editorial calendar to deliver targeted content

● Instrument conversion points and optimize user funnels

● Collaborate with agencies and other vendor partners

● Evaluate emerging technologies. Provide thought leadership and perspective for adoption where appropriate

● Social media savvy, with a passion for staying on top of trends

● Excellent interpersonal skills, with the ability to collaborate with other departments

● Strong understanding of digital marketing channels, including SEO, PPC, social media, email marketing, and display advertising

● Proficient in marketing automation tools

● Strong project management skills

● Excellent written and verbal communication skills

title: Junior Marketer
description:
**Jr. Paid Media Performance Marketer**

**Experience:** 2+ years

**Salary:** USD 1,000 - 1,500 / month

**Expected Notice Period**: 2 to 4 Weeks

**Shift**: (GMT+02:00) Europe/Kaliningrad (EET)

**Opportunity Type:** Remote

**Placement Type:** Contractual**Contract Duration:**  Full-Time, 12 months

**(\\*Note: This is a requirement for one of Uplers' clients)**

**What do you need for this opportunity?**

**Primary Skills**:

Conversion Campaign Optimization, Google Ads - Search, Meta Ads, Performance Max, Google Analytics ,LinkedIn Ads, Strong Attention to Detail

**Assessment:** 

Role based AI Screening covering Communication and Technical Skills

**Our Hiring Partner is Looking for:**

Jr. Paid Media Performance Marketer who is passionate about their work, eager to learn and grow, and who is committed to delivering exceptional results. If you are a team player, with a positive attitude and a desire to make a difference, then we want to hear from you.

**Roles & Responsibilities**

**About our Hiring Partner:**

A new era of technology for property sales & marketing We understand the challenges of different tenures when buying and selling a home. That’s why we’ve teamed up with developers, HAs and agents to create a new era of sales and marketing. Designed by people within your industry. responds to these challenges by providing a digital tool kit aimed at streamlining the sales experience for both the customer and provider. We are not just making it better, but making it work for you and your buyers.

Looking to be involved in a growing, global team? With our Digital marketing team members across the globe, this role has the unique opportunity to dive headfirst into driving paid digital marketing strategy and activity across up to 9 countries in Asia, working with our regional digital marketing managers, country managers and local area marketing teams.

**As a Performance Marketing Specialist, you will be responsible for technical functions such as:**

* Build, test, and optimize paid ad campaigns on META, Google Ads, LinkedIn, etc. to consistently improve performance
* Analyse and report on campaigns, A/B tests, leads, and revenue and ROI.
* Implement effective paid digital advertising campaigns to attract qualified prospects with cost-effective strategies across Facebook, Google and other paid advertising platforms.
* Contribute to Crimson’s paid digital marketing activity across multiple countries, working with Crimson’s regional digital marketing managers, country managers, local area marketing teams and the global digital marketing team to drive for results.

**How you’ll know you’re crushing it (KPI’s):**

* Digital marketing revenue targets are achieved consistently across all markets you are working with.
* Strong ROI across digital marketing channels.
* High engagement of stakeholders.
* Consistent tracking, reporting, knowledge sharing, and rapid iteration.

**Interview Process:**

* R1: Interview with Boris and Niko (Can be replaced by AI assessment)
* R2: Case Study
* R3: Panel Interview
* R4: People & Culture Round

**Project Requirements:**

**What skills and experience you’ll need:**

* At least 1-year experience in a performance marketing role or similar
* Hands-on experience with Facebook Ads & Google Ads
* Familiarity with Google Analytics, Marketo, Salesforce would be a plus
* Strong attention to detail
* Excellent verbal and written communication skills.
* Experience managing multiple projects in a fast-paced environment with other team members and stakeholders.
* Ability to productively and efficiently collaborate with a globally dispersed team.
* Analytical and problem-solving skills.
* Exceptional learning agility.
* Basic understanding of the UK and US admissions process.

**MUST HAVE SKILLS**

* Performance Max
* Google Ads - Search
* Experience and understanding of how algorithms work in search
* Experience with launching and optimizing conversion campaigns
* META
* High energy person who can help in reporting as well
* Proactive, who can take charge
* Accountable for their tasks
* Min spend they should have handled in past: 10K USD per month

**GOOD TO HAVE**

* Other Google Ads type
* LinkedIn

**Why work for Us?**

* Flexible working environment, you will be empowered to structure how you work
* Option to work from our many locations/remotely around the globe (role dependant) with us!
* Limitless development and exposure- our internal promotions/role changes made up 33% of all recruitment last year.
* $1,000 training budget per year- we love to level up!
* Psychologist on staff
* Impressive fireside chats and workshops to help the team continuously level up
* Radical Candour is a feedback approach we live by
* We’re a global player with 28 markets (and growing) across the globe!

**Additional Notes:**

* Engagement Type: Independent Contractor Agreement
* Availability: Full Time
* Duration: Ongoing
* How soon: ASAP

**About our Hiring Partner:**

New Zealand-based Edutech company was founded in 2013 with the idea that through personalized education, we can transform students into the world leaders of tomorrow. Since then, we have rapidly grown a mission-driven team that is dedicated to building the education system for the 22nd century. Our network includes 2,400 tutors and consultants worldwide who work with over 20,000 students. Our tech platform connects tutors and mentors to high school students aiming to achieve admission and scholarships to top universities in the US, Canada, UK, and beyond.

**About Uplers:**

Our goal is to make hiring reliable, simple, and fast. Our role will be to help all our talents find and apply for relevant remote contractual opportunities and progress in their career. We will support any grievances or challenges you may face during the engagement. You will also be assigned to a dedicated Talent Success Coach during the engagement.

(**Note:** There are many more opportunities apart from this on the portal. Depending on the assessments you clear, you can apply for them as well).

So, if you are ready for a new challenge, a great work environment, and an opportunity to take your career to the next level, don't hesitate to apply today. We are waiting for you!

title: Digital Marketer
description:
**Job Summary:**

As a Digital Marketing Specialist, you will play a crucial role in developing, implementing, and managing online marketing strategies to enhance brand visibility, drive customer engagement, and achieve business objectives. The ideal candidate possesses a strong understanding of digital platforms, analytics, and trends, along with a creative flair for crafting compelling content.

**Responsibilities:**

* **Digital Strategy Development:**
* Collaborate with cross-functional teams to define digital marketing goals and objectives aligned with overall business objectives.
* Develop comprehensive digital marketing strategies encompassing SEO, SEM, social media, email marketing, content marketing, and other relevant channels.
* **Content Creation and Management:**
* Create engaging and shareable content for various digital platforms.
* Manage content calendars to ensure a consistent and relevant online presence.
* Optimize content for SEO and user engagement.
* **Social Media Management:**
* Develop and execute social media strategies to increase brand awareness and engagement.
* Monitor and respond to social media trends, comments, and messages.
* Utilize social media advertising to reach target audiences effectively.
* **Search Engine Optimization (SEO):**
* Conduct keyword research and analysis to optimize website content.
* Implement on-page and off-page SEO strategies to improve search engine rankings.
* Monitor and report on SEO performance metrics.
* **Analytics and Reporting:**
* Utilize analytics tools to track, analyze, and report on digital marketing performance.
* Generate insights and recommendations based on data to enhance campaign effectiveness.
* **Digital Advertising:**
* Plan and execute online advertising campaigns across various platforms (Google Ads, social media ads, etc.).
* Monitor and optimize ad performance to maximize ROI.
* **Collaboration and Communication:**
* Collaborate with design, content, and other teams to ensure consistent brand messaging.
* Stay informed about industry trends, emerging technologies, and digital marketing best practices.

**Qualifications:**

* Bachelor’s degree in Marketing, Communications, or a related field.
* Proven experience in digital marketing, with a focus on strategy development and implementation.
* Strong knowledge of digital marketing channels, tools, and analytics.
* Proficiency in using social media platforms, content management systems, and email marketing tools.
* Experience with SEO best practices and tools.
* Analytical mindset with the ability to interpret data and make strategic recommendations.
* Excellent written and verbal communication skills.
* Creative thinking and ability to generate innovative ideas.

title: SEO Executive
description:
**Job Description: Search Engine Optimization (SEO) Specialist**

**About Us:** SSAM Softwares is a leading India based web design & development company providing services in more than 15 countries, was founded in 2015 with the goal of providing businesses the clearest way to create Worldwide existence through the web

**Position Overview:** We are seeking a skilled and motivated Search Engine Optimization (SEO) Specialist to join our team. As an SEO Specialist, you will play a pivotal role in enhancing our online visibility and driving organic traffic to our digital assets. with a strong understanding of search engine algorithms, keyword research, and content optimization.

**Responsibilities:**

* Conduct thorough keyword research to identify opportunities for improving organic rankings and website traffic.
* Collaborate with content creators to ensure the production of high-quality, SEO-friendly content that resonates with our target audience.
* Working with our internal resources to prepare, plan, and execute link building and content marketing strategies
* Stay updated with the latest trends and changes in search engine algorithms and SEO practices, and adapt strategies accordingly.
* Research and recommend new strategies and tactics to improve overall SEO performance.
* Optimize website structure and navigation for better user experience and search engine visibility.
* Collaborate with web developers to implement technical SEO recommendations.

**Qualifications:**

* Minimum of 6 months to 1 year of hands-on experience in Search Engine Optimization.
* Strong understanding of search engine algorithms and ranking factors.
* Proficiency in using SEO tools such as Google Analytics, Google Search Console, SEMrush, Moz, BrightEdge, DeepCrawl, Conductor, etc.
* Familiarity with HTML, CSS, and website architecture as they relate to SEO.
* Excellent analytical skills with the ability to interpret data and generate actionable insights.
* Experience in conducting thorough keyword research and competitive analysis.
* Basic knowledge of content management systems (CMS) and website platforms.
* Solid written and verbal communication skills.
* Self-motivated and proactive in staying up-to-date with industry trends and best practices.

**Salary and Benefits:**

* Salary range: 15,000 to 35,000, commensurate with experience.
* Opportunities for professional growth and development.
* Collaborative and dynamic work environment.
* Health and wellness benefits.

title: Meta Ads Expert
description:
We are seeking a skilled and experienced Google/Meta Ads Specialist to join our dynamic team of digital marketing professionals. As a specialist, you will play a crucial role in planning, implementing, and optimizing advertising campaigns on Google and Meta platforms. The ideal candidate should have a proven track record of delivering successful digital advertising strategies, a deep understanding of the latest trends and best practices, and the ability to drive measurable results for our clients.

**Responsibilities**:

Campaign Strategy and Planning:

Develop comprehensive digital advertising strategies on Google and Meta platforms based on client objectives and target audience.  
Conduct thorough keyword research, competitor analysis, and audience targeting to optimize campaign performance.  
Campaign Implementation:

Set up, manage, and optimize Google Ads and Meta Ads campaigns across various platforms.  
Create compelling ad copy, design effective ad creatives, and ensure adherence to industry best practices.  
Performance Monitoring and Analysis:

Monitor campaign performance metrics and key performance indicators (KPIs) regularly.  
Analyze data to identify trends, insights, and areas for improvement.  
Provide timely and insightful reports to clients on campaign performance.  
Optimization and A/B Testing:

Continuously optimize campaigns to improve click-through rates, conversion rates, and overall ROI.  
Conduct A/B testing to refine ad creatives, targeting, and other campaign elements.  
Client Communication:

Collaborate with clients to understand their business goals and objectives.  
Communicate campaign performance, insights, and recommendations to clients in a clear and professional manner.  
Stay Updated on Industry Trends:

Keep abreast of industry trends, algorithm updates, and new features on Google and Meta platforms.  
Proactively recommend and implement new strategies to stay ahead of the competition.

**Requirements**:

Proven experience as a Google Ads and Meta Ads Specialist, with a successful track record in managing and optimizing digital advertising campaigns.

In-depth knowledge of Google Ads, Meta Ads, and other relevant advertising platforms.

Strong analytical skills and the ability to translate data into actionable insights.

Excellent communication and client-facing skills.

Certifications in Google Ads and Meta Ads are a plus.

Familiarity with other digital marketing channels (SEO, social media, email marketing) is a bonus.

description:

\\*\\*Location: Ernakulam, Kerala\\*\\*

\\*\\*Job Type: Full-time\\*\\*

\\***Job Description:**

We are seeking a dynamic and results-driven Digital Marketing Expert to join our team. The ideal candidate should have a minimum of 3 years of hands-on experience in digital marketing, demonstrating a proven track record of successful campaigns and strategic initiatives. As a Digital Marketing Expert, you will play a crucial role in developing, implementing, and managing our digital marketing efforts across various channels.

**Responsibilities:**

Strategic Planning: Develop and execute comprehensive digital marketing strategies to drive brand awareness, customer acquisition, and revenue growth.

Campaign Management: Create and manage end-to-end digital marketing campaigns, including planning, execution, monitoring, and optimization.

SEO and SEM: Optimize website content for search engines (SEO) and manage paid advertising campaigns (SEM) to enhance online visibility and drive traffic.

Social Media Management: Oversee and implement social media strategies across platforms to engage audiences, build brand presence, and generate leads.

Content Marketing: Develop and execute content marketing strategies to create relevant and valuable content for various digital channels.

Analytics and Reporting: Monitor and analyze key performance indicators (KPIs), providing regular reports and insights to measure the success of campaigns and identify areas for improvement.

Email Marketing: Manage email marketing campaigns, including segmentation, content creation, and performance analysis.

Collaboration: Work closely with cross-functional teams, including design, development, and sales, to ensure alignment of digital marketing efforts with overall business goals.

**Requirements**:

Bachelor's degree in Marketing, Business, or a related field.

Proven experience in digital marketing with a focus on strategy development and campaign management.

In-depth knowledge of SEO, SEM, social media platforms, and content marketing.

Experience with analytics tools and platforms (e.g., Google Analytics, Adobe Analytics).

Excellent communication and collaboration skills.

Up-to-date with the latest trends and best practices in digital marketing.

Certifications in digital marketing will be a plus.

If you are passionate about digital marketing, possess a creative mindset, and have a proven ability to drive results, we invite you to apply for this exciting opportunity. Join our team and contribute to the success of our brand through innovative and effective digital marketing strategies.

title: Content Marketer
description:
Job Title: Content Marketing Specialist

Location: Remote

Company: Lead Tech, Inc. (LEAD)

About Us:

Lead Tech, Inc. (LEAD) is a venture-backed startup based in San Francisco, revolutionizing people operations for leading companies. Our AI-driven technology facilitates connections among employees through internal communication platforms like Slack and Microsoft Teams, fostering robust networks within hybrid workforces to boost performance and productivity. Our solutions are trusted by Fortune 500 companies, including Microsoft and IHG.

Role Overview:

We are seeking a native English-speaking Content Marketing Specialist with a deep understanding of human resources and strong business acumen. The ideal candidate will possess the ability to craft compelling articles based on our products, competitor insights, and industry news to enhance our content marketing efforts. Additionally, this role involves managing our social media presence on platforms like LinkedIn and Twitter, engaging with industry experts to increase our audience and promote our newsletters and business accounts.

Key Responsibilities:

* Develop and execute a content marketing strategy that aligns with our company’s goals.
* Write insightful articles, blog posts, social media posts and newsletters that reflect our innovative HR solutions.
* Manage social media accounts, engaging with industry experts to drive traffic to our newsletters and business platforms.
* Craft engaging short messages and emails for various marketing campaigns.
* Use tools like Canva to create captivating illustrations for blog articles and social media posts.
* Use tools like ChatGPT or other AI writing tools to boost your own productivity.
* Collaborate closely with the product team to ensure content accuracy and relevance.
* Maintain and organize content schedules using Google Docs and Sheets.

Qualifications:

* Native fluency in English with excellent writing and communication skills.
* Proven experience in content creation, social media management, and digital marketing.
* Strong understanding of human resources practices and business strategies.
* Familiarity with AI technologies and their application in HR solutions is a plus.
* Proficiency in Google Docs, Sheets, and content design tools like Canva.
* Ability to work independently and coordinate effectively with the product team.

What We Offer:

* The opportunity to be part of a dynamic team transforming HR operations in leading companies.
* A culture that values innovation, creativity, and diversity.
* Competitive salary and benefits package.
* Flexible working arrangements.

How to Apply:

1. Please submit your resume and a cover letter explaining how your experience aligns with this role's requirements.

2. Additionally, as part of your application, we request a 500-word sample article on a topic, details:(https://docs.google.com/document/d/1vuf4sKwT9\\_1T6Fy9ioMuRzeMdAWFO08OQqB-RmT30VE/edit?usp=sharing ), showcasing your ability to craft content relevant to our industry and mission. Please share this sample along with your other application materials directly with alyssa@lead.app. We're eager to see how you can contribute to our mission at Lead Tech, Inc.

Lead Tech, Inc. is an equal-opportunity employer committed to diversity and inclusion in the workplace.
