title: SEO Executive
description:
**Job Description –SEO SPECIALIST**

**Maple Tech Space** is an IT consultancy firm **based in Canada** with **our Head Office in Ontario**, and offshore offices in Kerala. Maple Tech Space has strong expertise in IT consulting, Digital Marketing, App Development, and Web services. Maple Tech Space is a product-oriented company with three products running successfully in the Canadian market. Since its launch, it has seen rapid expansion with over 1000 clients in Canada.

We are seeking a motivated and results-driven individual to join our Digital Marketing team as an **SEO Specialist.** The ideal candidate will have a minimum of one year of experience in SEO, with a focus on blogger outreach and acquiring quality backlinks. **As an SEO Specialist, you will play a crucial role in enhancing our online presence and driving organic traffic to our website.**

**Responsibilities:**

**1. Blogger Outreach:** Identify and establish relationships with relevant bloggers, influencers, and industry experts. Collaborate with the content team to create compelling and shareable content for outreach campaigns. Conduct outreach activities to secure guest posting opportunities and collaborations.

**2. Backlink Acquisition:** Develop and execute strategies to acquire high-quality backlinks from authoritative websites. Monitor and analyze backlink profiles to ensure compliance with best practices and industry standards. Stay updated on the latest trends and algorithm changes to adapt link-building strategies accordingly.

**3. Collaboration:** Work closely with the content team to align content creation with SEO objectives. Collaborate with cross-functional teams to implement on-page and off-page SEO best practices.

**4. Reporting:** Provide regular reports on the performance of SEO efforts, including key metrics and insights. Utilize analytics tools to track and measure the effectiveness of backlink acquisition strategies.

**Qualifications:**  
A. Minimum of 1 year of experience in SEO, with a focus on blogger outreach and backlink acquisition.  
B. Overall understanding of On-Page SEO is a plus.  
C. Knowledge of search engine algorithms, ranking factors, and SEO best practices.  
D. Excellent communication and interpersonal skills.  
E. Strong analytical and problem-solving abilities.  
F. Familiarity with SEO tools such as SEMrush, Ahrefs, or Moz.

**Perks and Benefits:**  
 Unlimited and swift career growth for performing candidates (We do not look at tenure if your performance hits the roof)  
 A fun, young and vibrant team to work with.  
 Exposure to international clients and world-class work culture.

online presence using various forms of content? If so, we have an exciting opportunity for you to join our  

Content team as a long-form Content Specialist.  

  

**About the Job:**  

Our goal is to make local businesses successful. Long-Form Content Specialists work to help local businesses  

establish and/or maintain their online presence using various forms of content. The ideal candidate for this  

role would be someone who understands the importance of quality content to drive results for small  

businesses, has a keen eye for detail, and can keep up with the changing landscape in content marketing. They  

must be comfortable switching gears quickly, working with tight deadlines, and learning new content strategies  

efficiently.  

  

**Your Impact:**



As a Longform content specialistyou'll work with our marketing services to:


* Help businesses establish themselves as local experts with well-researched, topical, and original written content.
* Conduct in-depth research to develop valuable content assets
* Create short and long-form written materials such as blogs, native ads, LMS courses, and email marketing campaigns in a variety of verticals, with SEO best practices in mind
* Able to create and speak to reports outlining fulfilled services and proof of performance
* Construct custom-written content based on specific objectives and audiences
* Maintain an ever-changing understanding of current content marketing trends and strategies

  

**What You Bring to the Table:**  

* Strong writing and editing skills are a must
* Digital marketing experience is an asset
* Strong knowledge of SEO best practices and emerging trends
* Proficient knowledge of social media (Twitter, Facebook, etc.)
* Excellent written and verbal communication skills
* Exceptional organizational skills and keen attention to detail
* Ability to work independently as well as collaborate within a team
* Experience with LMS courses or instructional design is an asset

  

**Responsible for the following KPIs:**  

* # Blog posts and words completed
* # Blogs QA
* # Blogs revised
* # Blogs delivered
* # Webcopy words completed
* # Webcopy QA
* Content calls completed

  

**About Vendasta:**  

So what do we actually do? Vendasta is a SaaS company composed of a company of global brands including; MatchCraft, Yesware and Broadly, that builds and sells software and services to help small businesses operate more efficiently as a team, meet more client needs, and provide incredible client experiences. We have offices in Saskatoon, Saskatchewan, Canada, Boston and Boca Raton, Florida, United States and Chennai, India.  

  

**Perks:**  

* Benefits health insurance
* Paid time offs
* Training & Career Development: Professional development plans, leadership workshops, mentorship programs, and more!
* Free Snacks, hot beverages, and catered lunches on Fridays
* Culture - comprised of our core values: Drive, Innovation, Respect, and Agility
* Provident Fund

title: Digital Marketer
description:
##### **Job Type: Full Time**


##### **Job Category: IT**


#### **Job Description**


The ideal candidate will be adept at managing various digital marketing channels, including Facebook, Instagram, YouTube Reels, Meta Ads, Google Ads, and Social Media Optimization (SMO). This role requires a strategic thinker with a proven track record of driving results through innovative digital marketing campaigns. Responsibilities: Develop and implement comprehensive digital marketing strategies to achieve business objectives, including brand awareness, lead generation. Manage and optimize SocialMedia (Facebook, Instagram, and YouTube) company pages, use campaigns to maximize reach, engagement, and conversion rates. Plan, create, and publish engaging and relevant content for SocialMedia (Facebook, Instagram, and YouTube) Reels on various subjects to attract and retain a target audience. Oversee Meta Ads campaigns across Facebook and Instagram, including audience targeting, ad creative development, and budget management. Manage Google Ads campaigns across Search, Display, and Video networks, focusing on keyword optimization, bidding strategies, and ad performance. Implement Social Media Optimization (SMO) techniques to enhance the visibility and engagement of our brand on social media platforms. Analyze campaign performance metrics such as CTR, CPC, CPA, and ROAS to optimize campaigns for maximum effectiveness and ROI. Conduct market research and competitor analysis to identify trends, opportunities, and areas for improvement in our digital marketing efforts. Collaborate with cross-functional teams including design, content, and product teams to ensure brand consistency and messaging alignment across all digital channels. Stay informed about industry trends, algorithm updates, and best practices in digital marketing to continuously improve campaign performance and stay ahead of the competition. Provide regular reports and insights to senior management on digital marketing performance, highlighting successes, challenges, and recommendations for improvement. Experience in digital marketing, with a focus on managing Facebook, Instagram, YouTube Reels, Meta Ads, Google Ads, and SMO. Proven track record of planning and executing successful digital marketing campaigns that have driven measurable results. Strong understanding of digital marketing analytics tools such as Google Analytics, Facebook Insights, and YouTube Analytics. Excellent project management skills with the ability to prioritize tasks, meet deadlines, and manage multiple projects simultaneously. Creative thinker with a passion for storytelling and creating engaging content for digital platforms. Strong analytical skills with the ability to interpret data, draw insights, and make data-driven decisions. Excellent communication and interpersonal skills with the ability to collaborate effectively with cross-functional teams. Certifications in Google Ads, Meta Ads, or other relevant digital marketing certifications are preferred. A self-starter with a proactive mindset and a willingness to learn and adapt in a fast-paced environment.

  


##### **Required Skills**


digital marketing analytics SMO Social Media Optimization

description:

Our client is a digital marketing agency based in the USA. They're looking for an experienced Marketing Automation Specialist to create effective marketing online campaigns with automated, repetitive tasks.

We are looking for a Marketing Automation Specialist to spearhead marketing automation efforts for our client. You will play a crucial role in optimizing marketing processes, improving efficiency, and driving results through automation.

* Monitor and analyze campaign performance, providing insights and recommendations for optimization.
* Stay updated on industry trends and best practices in marketing automation.

The candidate should be well-versed in managing and optimizing social media platforms such as Facebook, LinkedIn, Instagram, Twitter, and TikTok. title: Data Specialist
description:
At Vertiv, we build products that keep critical technologies running 24/7. We are proud we were the first to protect mainframes with precision cooling systems. We were the first to introduce an integrated enclosure system to distributed networks. We help some of the largest names in the industry bring new capacity online faster and at a lower cost when search and social media increased demand for storage and computing. Our portfolio spans power, thermal and infrastructure management products, software and solutions, and is complemented by a network of nearly 250 service centers worldwide.  



The **Marketing Data Analytics Specialist** is a professional who will fuel our digital transformations towards customer centricity with safe, accurate, current and reliable data and enable our leaders to take data driven decisions.  



Working as part of Customer Insight Team as **Marketing Data Analytics Specialist** , he/she will be responsible for developing, implementing and maintaining various Marketing reporting & analytical activities.  



The postholder will play an active role in enriching Marketing reporting systems and dashboards by maintaining the critical data to be captured, ensuring the quality and compliance to the data standards and policies. They are key contributors to sound, timely, and actionable reports based on data coming from various sources, both internal and external, with the objective to enable the marketing organization to maximize business impact.  



In addition, he/she will perform accuracy checks to ensure that data are transmitted consistently from source systems into analytical and reporting tools. He/she will also propose ways to improve processes and data accurance, both by automazing data collection that are currently not, and updatating the process itself.  



The postholder will ensure that dashboards are meaningful to stakeholders, that all relevant KPIs are present and that data are visualized in the best way to be easily understandable and actionable to the recipients.  



**Key Responsibilities**

**Marketing Data Analytics Specialist** will focus on the business data for Marketing and related fuctions. This will include customer data, campaign and promotions data, customer value and engagement scores, Channel Partner data, customer data and third party data. It will also encompass with product and commercial data such as opportunity, leads and purchase. He will ensure all inputs, automated and manual, are properly sourced to update marketing reports and dashboard according to deadline.  



**Essential Jop Functions**

Supporting the Data Model developing track during definition / implementation / upgrade / deployment steps, ensuring that timelines are met and objectives are achieved.  

* 

Support the data acquisition strategy to ensure that desired levels of breadth and quality are achieved  

* 

Building meaningful and insightful dashboards, leveraging business data  

* 

Support initiatives for data management improvements  

* 

Work with other collegues and build effective relationships (e.g. other team members, IT etc.)  

* 

Be accountable for data management status, progress and success and communicate it  

* 

Support the design of the optimized, secure and efficienct tech-infrastructure in close cooperation with stakeholders to intake and store Marketing data for the best use of it such as targeting, analysis, insight generation, performance reporting etc.  

* 

Monitor and sustain the data quality and compliance  

* 

* Documenting BI & Reporting Solutions

JOB QUALIFICATIONS  

* Educated to degree level, technical matters (Engineering, economics, computer science, or related field)
* At least 3-4 years experience in driving data quality initiatives, joining data from disparate systems and finding new ways to provide data consumers easy access to the information they need
* Knowledge of Power BI and DAX, SQL, Excel at an advanced level
* Basic knowledge about Power Platform like MS Power Automate, Power Apps, Sharepoint.
* Basic knowledge about Python libraries like Pandas, Numpy, EDA, matplotly etc.
* Very good communications skills when working with teammates who may be either data-driven or more qualitative
* Team player with positive “Can‐do” attitude and enough charisma to lead without authority
* Practical experience of working in analytical activities
* Excellent verbal and written communications skills – able to present thoughts and ideas clearly and concisely to a senior audience.
* Excellent research and analytical skills.
* Creativity to conceptualize new ideas, with the ability to turn them into a practical reality.
* Clarity of thought, critical and Analytical thinking skills are must
* Capable of working within a matrix style of management
* Excellent time management
* Good communication and presentation skills
* Having an in depth understanding of main Company Finance parameters
* Fluent English
* Resillience to work under constant pressure with calmness and composure.

DESIRABLE ATTITUDE
* Self-motivated, enthusiastic and outgoing individual, capable of working in a changing environment and able to deal with colleagues from different world areas
* Positive and adaptable approach to problem solving
* Methodical and analytical behavior
* Capability to work under pressure and with deadlines
* Multitasking attitude
* Proactive attitude
* Able to work as part of a team
Possessing an eye for detail  
* 

The above duties and responsibilities are intended to describe the general nature and requirements of the position and are not intended to be an exhaustive list. In order to achieve business objectives, other duties may be included at the discretion of the department manager.

title: PPC Specialist
description:
**Job Title: PPC Specialist (FMCG)**
**Location: Preferred someone based out in Tier 2 and Tier 3 cities of India (Remote work)**
**Work timings: 6:30 PM – 3:30 AM IST**
**Job Type: Full-time**

  

**Job Description:**



We are actively seeking a highly skilled and experienced PPC Specialist with a focus on Fast-Moving Consumer Goods (FMCG) campaigns to join our digital marketing team. The ideal candidate will have a proven track record of successfully planning, executing, and optimizing PPC campaigns within the FMCG sector. This role requires a strategic thinker with a deep understanding of paid advertising platforms and a commitment to achieving measurable results.


**Responsibilities:**


**FMCG PPC Strategy:**


* Develop and implement effective PPC strategies tailored specifically to the FMCG industry.
* Conduct thorough keyword research and analysis to identify high-value opportunities for FMCG products.

  


**Campaign Management:**


* Plan, launch, and manage PPC campaigns across various platforms, including Google Ads, Bing Ads, and other relevant networks.
* Monitor and optimize campaign performance to achieve KPIs such as ROAS, CTR, and conversion rates.
* Stay abreast of industry trends and competitor activities to adapt strategies accordingly.

  


**Budget Management:**


* Manage and allocate budget effectively to maximize ROI for FMCG PPC campaigns.
* Implement budget adjustments based on performance data and market trends.

  


**Ad Copy and Creative Development:**


* Collaborate with the creative team to develop compelling ad copy and visuals that resonate with the target audience in the FMCG sector.
* Conduct A/B testing to optimize ad creatives for better performance.

  


**Analytics and Reporting:**


* Utilize analytics tools to track and analyze the performance of PPC campaigns.
* Prepare regular reports showcasing key metrics and insights, providing recommendations for improvement.

  


**FMCG Industry Insight:**


* Stay informed about market trends, consumer behavior, and industry changes affecting the FMCG sector.
* Apply industry-specific knowledge to enhance PPC strategies and campaign effectiveness.


**Qualifications:**


* Bachelor’s degree in Marketing, Advertising, Business, or related field.
* Proven experience in planning, executing, and optimizing PPC campaigns for FMCG brands.
* In-depth knowledge of Google Ads, Bing Ads, and other PPC platforms.
* Strong analytical skills with the ability to interpret data and make data-driven decisions.
* Excellent communication and collaboration skills.


**Preferred Skills:**


* Certifications in Google Ads and Bing Ads.
* Familiarity with e-commerce platforms and product listing ads.
* Experience with bid management tools and analytics platforms.

description:

**Experience:** 4+ years

**Salary:** USD 2,000 - 3,000 / month

**Expected Notice Period**: 2 to 4 Weeks

**Shift**: 10:00AM to 6:00PM IST

**Opportunity Type:** Remote

**Placement Type:** Permanent

**(\\*Note: This is a requirement for one of Uplers' clients)**

**What do you need for this opportunity?**

**Primary Skills**:

Collaboration, Api Integration, Data Analytics, Data Modeling, ETL, Marketo, RESTful API, Google Tag Manager, HTML / CSS, JavaScript, Node Js, Problem Solving Attitude, SQL, Strong Attention To Detail

**Assessment:** 

Role based AI Screening covering Communication and Technical Skills

**Our Hiring Partner is Looking for:**

UI/UX Designer who is passionate about their work, eager to learn and grow, and who is committed to delivering exceptional results. If you are a team player, with a positive attitude and a desire to make a difference, then we want to hear from you.

**Roles & Responsibilities**

**Job Overview:**

Join our dynamic team as a Marketing Tech Specialist, where your expertise becomes the driving force behind enhancing our digital marketing initiatives. You'll be the tech virtuoso in our digital marketing team, instrumental in implementing tech solutions and spearheading new opportunities for growth and efficiency. Your role is pivotal in integrating technology seamlessly with our marketing strategies, ensuring our digital presence is not just current but pioneering.

**Key Responsibilities:**

* Technical Leadership in Digital Marketing: Provide advanced technical leadership and implement technical upgrades for our performance marketing team. This includes integrating ad platform tracking codes, setting up offline conversion events, and ensuring seamless integrations between various marketing tools.
* Strategic Implementation & Troubleshooting: Offer expert assistance in troubleshooting, including resolving complex technical issues like broken pixels, tracking errors, and website functionality. Your role is crucial in maintaining and enhancing our technical marketing infrastructure.
* Analytics Expertise: Utilize your proficiency with Google Analytics, looker studio and other data analytics tools to drive insights and inform marketing strategies.
* Collaborative Workflow Optimization: Work in tandem with other web developers and marketing teams to implement strategic website enhancements. Your role involves identifying process gaps and optimizing workflows to boost productivity and performance.
* Requirements Analysis & System Integration: Engage in defining business and technical requirements, application design, and deployment, ensuring a seamless integration of MarTech products with other systems.
* Innovative Tech Implementation: Stay ahead of the curve by constantly exploring and recommending new technologies and platforms that can enhance our marketing effectiveness.

**Engagement Type:**

* Direct-hire on the client payroll
* Client / Talent Agreement - Full-time Permanent position
* The client will sign the contract agreement with the talent directly and manage the payroll

**Project Requirements:**

**Technical Skills:**

* Technical Proficiency: Strong experience with FB & Google Marketing API integration, RESTful development, Node JS, Marketo, Google Tag Manager, and familiarity with other ads management platforms (Smartly, LinkedIn Ads, etc.).
* Proficiency in web development languages (HTML, CSS, JavaScript).
* Analytical Skills: Expertise in data analytics, relational databases, SQL data modeling, and ETL tools.

\\*

**Education & Behaviour:**

* Educational Background: Bachelor’s degree in Computer Science, Information Technology, Web Development, or a related field.
* Marketing Savvy: Basic understanding of marketing principles combined with a passion for digital marketing technologies.
* Communication & Collaboration: Excellent verbal and written communication skills, with a talent for collaborating effectively across diverse teams.
* Problem-Solving: Exceptional problem-solving abilities to address challenges in a complex and often ambiguous environment.
* Project Management: Highly independent with robust project management skills.

**Desirable Skills:**

* Experience with Marketo, Salesforce, GA4, video editing, and agile software development methodologies.
* A keen eye for leveraging marketing and sales technologies to drive impactful results.

**How to apply for this opportunity?**

* Register or login on our portal & fill out the application
* Clear the given AI Screening (30 min) and Click on ‘Apply’ to get shortlisted
* Our team of talent matchmakers will matchmake you with the client
* Crack a quick interview with our client
* Land your global dream job and get your exciting career started!

**About our Hiring Partner:**

New Zealand-based Edutech company was founded in 2013 with the idea that through personalized education, we can transform students into the world leaders of tomorrow. Since then, we have rapidly grown a mission-driven team that is dedicated to building the education system for the 22nd century. Our network includes 2,400 tutors and consultants worldwide who work with over 20,000 students. Our tech platform connects tutors and mentors to high school students aiming to achieve admission and scholarships to top universities in the US, Canada, UK, and beyond.

**About Uplers:**

Our goal is to make hiring reliable, simple, and fast. Our role will be to help all our talents find and apply for relevant opportunities and progress in their career. We will support any grievances or challenges you may face during the engagement. You will also be assigned to a dedicated Talent Success Coach during the engagement.

(**Note:** There are many more opportunities apart from this on the portal. Depending on the assessments you clear, you can apply for them as well).

So, if you are ready for a new challenge, a great work environment, and an opportunity to take your career to the next level, don't hesitate to apply today. We are waiting for you!

title: Branded Content Intern - 1862 Sea
description:
**About OML:**  

OML is a new media and entertainment company that partners with creators to build content, IPs & live experiences that impact culture and help brands come closer to consumers. Headquartered in Mumbai with teams in Russia, Poland & Thailand, OML was founded in 2001 to book and manage artistes across all genres of entertainment. Today our operations span a prolific and award-winning content studio that packages and produces shows for OTT platforms, live events production and a global brand solutions business.
From the beginnings of OML as an artist management agency to the advent of modern-day content marketing, we have helped our clients thrive in the face of disruption while setting trends in talent representation, marketing and sponsorship; inspiring industry change in events and licensing; and helping reshape the digital landscape. As technology further shifts the balance of power in media and puts more power in the hands of the creator, OML is uniquely positioned to create opportunities for our clients and partners around the globe.

  

The 2 formidable pillars of OML:

* Global Creator Network (GCN) is the brand solutions division of OML that develops branded content with creators & influencers globally across various digital platforms. We strive to drive digital campaign resonance through the line, backing our solutions with strong data insights and measuring impact all through.
* 1862 - We are a specialist team housed under GCN that manage & drive Bacardi Global's digital & content marketing efforts in over 24+ countries spanning South-east Asia, India, Africa, Middle East, USA, Eastern Europe, Russia & Poland as major regions


Visit oml.in for more information

  

Where do you fit in?  

We’re looking for highly driven and motivated individuals to join as an intern within the 1862 team that manages the South East Asia Market.


Responsibilities:

* Research on-going consumer trends, competitors, target audience & brands for international markets the brand is active in.
* Assist in developing and executing digital & influencer first marketing strategies and campaigns across social media platforms
* Assist in identifying and building relationships with prominent influencers and content creators across YouTube and Instagram
* Brainstorming new, creative approaches to influencer campaigns
* Assist in conceptualizing and sourcing content ideas from creators and influencers
* Liaising with the talent managers to create, coordinate and execute content marketing strategies across different channels
* Liaising with media and analytics and production teams to execute campaigns with team’s guidance
* Assist in preparing pitch presentations & budget sheets

  

Candidate Requirements:* Adequate exposure to the Digital universe across platforms & formats
* Should consume content on a daily basis
* Interest in creator/ influencer focussed marketing
* Keep abreast of emerging social media trends and influencers/ creators across social media platforms
* Should know how to use Powerpoint and Excel sheets well
* Should be able to handle multiple campaigns/creators/brands with ease
* Effective time management skills - should be able to manage their time well
* Good written, presentation & communication skills
* Quick and enthusiastic learner

  

Min Educational Qualification - Graduate  

  

Background - Preferably Mass Media, Advertising, Marketing & Art/Culture


Work Experience - 6 months- 1 year

  

Experience/Exposure Areas - In the field of or related to Digital Marketing, Social Media Marketing/ Advertising, Content Marketing, Advertising/Marketing, Film/creative/media production, Creative/brand strategy

We will get in touch with you if your profile gets shortlisted.  

Our values:* We build opportunities for our artists, brands and fans; and it’s important for us to be reliable and efficient
* We demonstrate honesty, excellence and commitment to success
* ‘It’s not my job’ is not part of our vocabulary, we even stuff envelopes
* We make mistakes, but only to learn from them to build resilience
* We take care of ourselves and our colleagues
* We are our own managers
* We are committed to equality and inclusion
* We are mindful of the strain on the Earth's resources and are committed to reversing the trend with our behaviors where possible

**Job Title: Digital Marketer - E-commerce Specialist**

**Position Overview:**  
We are seeking a highly skilled and experienced Digital Marketer with a strong background in e-commerce, possessing a minimum of 4-5 years of hands-on experience. The ideal candidate will have a deep understanding of digital marketing strategies, a proven track record of successful e-commerce campaigns, and a mandatory certification in Amazon Ads.

**Responsibilities:**

**Develop and Execute Digital Marketing Strategies:**

* Formulate and implement comprehensive digital marketing strategies aligned with e-commerce goals and objectives.
* Drive brand awareness, customer acquisition, and revenue growth through various digital channels.

**Amazon Ads Management:**

* Utilize in-depth knowledge of Amazon Ads to create and manage effective advertising campaigns.
* Optimize ad performance through A/B testing, keyword analysis, and other relevant strategies.

**E-commerce Analytics:**

* Monitor and analyze key performance indicators (KPIs) to measure the success of digital marketing efforts.

**Content Marketing:**

* Collaborate with content creators to develop compelling and engaging content for online platforms.

* Manage and optimize social media profiles to enhance brand presence.
* Create and execute social media campaigns to drive traffic and engagement.

**SEO Optimization:**

* Implement SEO strategies to improve website visibility and search engine rankings.
* Stay updated on industry trends and algorithm changes to adapt strategies accordingly.

**E-commerce Platform Management:**

* Oversee and optimize the user experience on the e-commerce platform.

**Budget Management:**

* Manage digital marketing budgets effectively, ensuring maximum ROI.
* Provide regular reports on budget utilization and campaign performance.

**Qualifications:**

* Bachelor's degree in Marketing, Business, or a related field.

* Strong analytical skills and proficiency in using digital marketing tools and platforms.

title: E-commerce Specialist
description:
**Job Description: Junior SEO and E-commerce Specialist (Fresher)**

**Position Overview:**We are excited to welcome a passionate and eager Junior SEO and E-commerce Specialist to our dynamic digital marketing team. If you have a strong interest in search engine optimization (SEO) and e-commerce, along with a basic understanding of digital marketing principles, this is a great opportunity for you to learn and grow in a supportive environment. As a Junior SEO and E-commerce Specialist, you will be exposed to hands-on experience in optimizing websites, improving online visibility, and contributing to our e-commerce success.

**Responsibilities:**

**Learning and Development:** Undergo comprehensive training in SEO strategies, e-commerce best practices, and digital marketing fundamentals to build a strong foundation for your role.

**Keyword Research:** Assist in conducting keyword research to identify relevant and high-potential keywords for website content, product descriptions, and metadata.

**Content Optimization:** Work alongside senior team members to optimize website content and product pages for improved search engine rankings and user engagement.

**On-Page SEO:** Learn how to implement on-page SEO techniques, such as meta tag optimization, header tag usage, and keyword placement.

**Technical SEO:** Collaborate with the team to support technical SEO initiatives, such as site structure optimization, URL optimization, and image optimization.

**E-commerce Support:** Contribute to the analysis of e-commerce performance metrics, assisting in identifying areas for improvement and suggesting optimization strategies.

**Data Analysis and Reporting:** Learn to use tools like Google Analytics and SEO software to gather data, generate reports, and provide insights for ongoing optimization.

**Content Creation:** Assist in creating compelling and SEO-friendly product descriptions, blog posts, and other relevant content.

**Competitor Analysis:** Support the team in monitoring industry trends and competitors' strategies to identify potential opportunities.

**Collaboration:** Work closely with team members across different disciplines, including content writers, designers, and developers, to ensure cohesive and effective SEO and e-commerce efforts.

**Qualifications:**

Bachelor's degree in Marketing, Business, Communications, or a related field.

Basic knowledge of digital marketing concepts, with a strong interest in SEO and e-commerce.

Familiarity with online tools and platforms, including Microsoft Office and Google Workspace.

Excellent analytical skills with a data-driven mindset.

Strong written and verbal communication skills.

Detail-oriented and organized, with the ability to manage tasks effectively.

Eagerness to learn and adapt to new technologies and industry trends.

Creative thinking and problem-solving abilities.

Job Types: Full-time, Internship

title: SEO Specialist
description:
**Company Description**

KAP Digital is a leading MarTech firm specializing in SEO and organic marketing, providing tailored solutions to businesses across diverse industries. Our team of highly skilled professionals leverages fundamental SEO elements and robust strategies to enhance search visibility, maximize ROI, and drive comprehensive growth for our clients. Embark on a journey with us to elevate your digital presence and achieve unparalleled success.

**Role Description**

We are seeking a full-time, on-site Sr. Off-Page SEO Executive for our Gurgaon location. The Off-Page SEO Specialist will play a key role in developing and executing off-page strategies, with a focus on link-building initiatives, influencer collaborations, and content partnerships. This position will also involve leveraging web analytics to refine strategies and ensure a positive impact on search rankings.

**Responsibilities:**

* Develop and implement effective off-page SEO strategies to enhance the online presence of our clients.
* Lead comprehensive link-building initiatives to improve website authority and search rankings.
* Identify and engage with influencers for collaborations and partnerships to broaden brand reach.
* Execute content outreach campaigns to secure high-quality backlinks from authoritative websites.
* Utilize web analytics tools to analyze data, derive actionable insights, and refine off-page strategies.
* Collaborate with cross-functional teams to ensure alignment with broader marketing goals.

title: Digital Marketer
description:
**Digital marketing refers to the use of digital channels, platforms, and technologies to promote products, services, or brands to targeted consumers. It encompasses a wide range of tactics and strategies aimed at reaching and engaging with potential customers online. Some common components of digital marketing include:**

**1. \\*\\*Search Engine Optimization (SEO)\\*\\*: Optimizing a website to rank higher in search engine results pages (SERPs) to increase visibility and organic traffic.**

**2. \\*\\*Content Marketing\\*\\*: Creating and distributing valuable, relevant content to attract and engage a target audience, with the aim of driving profitable customer action.**

**3. \\*\\*Social Media Marketing (SMM)\\*\\*: Leveraging social media platforms like Facebook, Twitter, Instagram, and LinkedIn to connect with audiences, build brand awareness, and drive website traffic or sales.**

**4. \\*\\*Email Marketing\\*\\*: Sending targeted messages to a specific group of recipients via email to promote products or services, build relationships, and drive conversions.**

**5. \\*\\*Pay-Per-Click (PPC) Advertising\\*\\*: Running paid advertisements on search engines or social media platforms, where advertisers pay a fee each time their ad is clicked. This includes Google Ads, Facebook Ads, and others.**

**6. \\*\\*Affiliate Marketing\\*\\*: Partnering with other businesses or individuals (affiliates) who promote your products or services in exchange for a commission for each sale or lead generated through their referral.**

**7. \\*\\*Influencer Marketing\\*\\*: Collaborating with influencers—individuals who have a dedicated and engaged following on social media—to promote products or services to their audience.**

**8. \\*\\*Online PR (Public Relations)\\*\\*: Managing a brand's online reputation and fostering positive relationships with online publications, bloggers, and influencers to earn media coverage and enhance credibility.**

**9. \\*\\*Analytics and Data Analysis\\*\\*: Using tools to track, measure, and analyze the performance of digital marketing campaigns to optimize strategies and improve ROI.**

**10. \\*\\*Mobile Marketing\\*\\*: Targeting consumers on mobile devices through tactics such as mobile-optimized websites, mobile apps, SMS marketing, and location-based services.**

**Digital marketing offers businesses numerous benefits, including increased reach, improved targeting, cost-effectiveness, real-time results tracking, and the ability to engage with audiences in a more personalized and interactive manner. As technology continues to evolve, so do the strategies and techniques used in digital marketing.**

**ex-2 years required**

**salary 15 k to 30 k**

title: Marketing Executive
description:
Seeking a dynamic and creative Marketing and Branding Specialist to lead our admission process and enhance our brand reputation in the surrounding communities. This role will involve both fieldwork and digital communications to attract prospective students, engage with stakeholders, and promote our institution's unique offerings. The ideal candidate will have a strong marketing background in the relevant industry, excellent communication skills, and a passion for education.

***Salary is negotiable based on the Interview performance & Last drawn.***

**Key Responsibilities:**

* **Admission Process Leadership:**
* Develop and implement strategies to attract prospective students and increase enrollment numbers.
* Coordinate admission events, open houses, and campus tours to showcase the institution's facilities, programs, and culture.
* Serve as a point of contact for prospective students and families, providing information about admission requirements, application procedures, and financial aid options.
* **Brand Reputation Enhancement:**
* Develop and execute marketing campaigns to enhance the institution's brand reputation and visibility in the surrounding community.
* Build relationships with local businesses, community organizations, and educational partners to promote collaboration and support for the institution.
* Monitor online reviews, social media conversations, and other sources of feedback to identify areas for improvement and address concerns proactively.
* **Fieldwork:**
* Conduct market research and analysis to identify target demographics, trends, and competitors in the education sector.
* Attend industry events, conferences, and networking opportunities to promote the institution and establish partnerships with key stakeholders.
* Collaborate with admissions teams, academic departments, and other staff members to develop marketing materials, presentations, and promotional campaigns.
* **Digital Communications:**
* Collect & Coordinate with the institution's leads generated from online presence, including the website, social media channels, and email marketing campaigns.

**Qualifications:**

* Bachelor's degree in Marketing, Communications, Business Administration, or related field.
* Proven experience in marketing, branding, or admissions, preferably in the education sector.
* Strong communication skills, both verbal and written, with the ability to convey complex ideas clearly and persuasively.
* Creative thinking and problem-solving abilities, with a focus on innovative and strategic approaches to marketing and branding.
* Excellent interpersonal skills and the ability to build rapport with diverse audiences, including students, parents, staff, and community members.
* Willingness to travel and work flexible hours as needed to accommodate events and activities.

title: Content Marketer
description:
**Marketing & Communications****,** **Customer**
------------------------------------------------


**Digital Content Marketing Specialist**
========================================


Closing date for applications: 18/03/2024


Gurugram, India


Permanent


Full Time


#R-00229326


  
Our people work differently depending on their jobs and needs. From hybrid working to flexible hours, we have plenty of options that help our people to thrive.



This role is based in India and as such all normal working days must be carried out in India.


**Job description**
-------------------



Join us as a Digital Content Marketing Specialist

* This is an opportunity to join a talented team, where you’ll be collaborating with marketing leaders, subject matter experts, and other creative professionals
* You’ll be supporting our online content marketing initiatives, creating attractive and engaging content
* Your work will play an important part in driving our brand awareness and helping us to meet our marketing business goals
* We're offering this role at associate level**What you'll do**
------------------


In this key role, you’ll be researching and creating attractive digital marketing content according to content marketing strategies. Day-to-day, we’ll look to you to leverage advantageous online communities to drive traffic, produce high quality content and gather quality lead generation. You’ll also be working closely with communications stakeholders to agree, prioritise and deliver a programme of social media initiatives, embedding innovative solutions that increase the effectiveness of employee communications.


Your duties will include:
* Effectively managing the production of content to ensure there is a steady stream of on-brand, engaging content going out each week in our social and CRM channels
* Support production of content relating to campaigns, reactive recruitment requests and larger digital projects as requiredCollaborate with team members across Talent Attraction to ensure clear line of sight of content streams including always-on, campaigns and content to support reactive recruitment
* Provide SME support and expertise to wider team around content specifications, brand guidelines and best practices across wider recruitment marketing activity and channels
* Proactively seek out content that can be used to positively promote our purpose and NatWest Group as a great place to work
* + You’ll also need:
	+ An eye for visual design, excellent creative skills and an ability to think creatively & laterally
	+ An excellent understanding of content production techniques including video production
	+ Advanced skills in Photoshop, Illustrator and copywriting, including writing for web and online
	+ Well versed in social media strategy and channels and marketing strategy
	+ Good understanding of audience personas and targeting per channel
	+ Experience working as part of a project and familiarity with project management tools and principles
	+ An understanding of the critical elements of brand visual identity and brand management
	+ Clear communicator to both technical and non-technical audiences
	+ **The skills you'll need**
	--------------------------
	
	
	We’re looking for someone with significant experience in developing and delivering social media content. You’ll have good communication skills, as you’ll need to manage relationships across the team. And you’ll have the ability to deliver on time and against agreed Service Level Agreements whilst balancing changing priorities.

* + You’ll also need:
	+ An eye for visual design, excellent creative skills and an ability to think creatively & laterally
	+ An excellent understanding of content production techniques including video production
	+ Advanced skills in Photoshop, Illustrator and copywriting, including writing for web and online
	+ Well versed in social media strategy and channels and marketing strategy
	+ Good understanding of audience personas and targeting per channel
	+ Experience working as part of a project and familiarity with project management tools and principles
	+ An understanding of the critical elements of brand visual identity and brand management
	+ Clear communicator to both technical and non-technical audiences
	+ **The skills you'll need**
	--------------------------
	
	
	We’re looking for someone with significant experience in developing and delivering social media content. You’ll have good communication skills, as you’ll need to manage relationships across the team. And you’ll have the ability to deliver on time and against agreed Service Level Agreements whilst balancing changing priorities.

title: Paid Search Manager
description:

**Job Overview**  
We are seeking a highly skilled and experienced Paid Ads Specialist to join our team. As a Paid Ads Specialist, you will be responsible for managing and optimizing paid advertising campaigns across various platforms to maximize ROI and achieve business objectives. This is a full-time position based in Agra, Uttar Pradesh, India.

1. Plan and run ads on Google, Meta platforms and other platform like Amazon, Flipkart.

2. In-depth knowledge of keyword research, ad creation, ad copywriting and optimization, and performance analysis

title: SEO Executive
description:
Full time SEO specialist who knows how to unlock organic growth.

We are looking for a passionate SEO Specialist to join our team and support with day to day SEO operations for our Clients.

**Key Responsibilities (but not limited to)**

* Support SEO Manager and Brand Teams in the execution of SEO strategy for the UK region
* Provide operational expertise and technical SEO guidance to the Clients to ensure the websites are fully optimized.
* Work with SEO Manager to ensure that all online development projects maximize organic search value.
* Carry out regular site audits and analysis across several Client websites to ensure they’re set up in line with SEO best practice and being continually optimized. Provide recommendations based on keyword research, authority, competition and highlight improvement opportunities.
* Regularly review sites to identify broken links, legacy pages and redirect chains.
* Manage and produce regular reporting on keyword performance, ranking and organic traffic for selected brands and share recommendations on how to enhance organic search visibility and performance. Report on impact of implemented changes.
* Contribute to the creation, maintenance and implementation of SEO best practice guidelines and keyword glossary.
* Ensure SEO best practice is considered from URL structure, product and navigation set up through to content creation and launches of new campaigns.
* Provide keyword glossary and guidance to digital copywriters to ensure on-site copy is fully optimized for SEO.
* Ensure we are up to date with industry trends, competitor activity, innovations and opportunities within the SEO space.
* Build relationships with key internal teams across brands, marketing, production and content to ensure SEO strategy is aligned.

**Qualifications:**

* Experience with Google and Bing’s services, including Analytics and Webmaster Tools
* Experience with Google’s Keyword Tool
* Experience with SEMrush
* A functional understanding of HTML and CSS
* The ability to work with back-end SEO elements such as, but not limited to .htaccess, robots.txt, metadata, site speed optimization, and related skills
* Proven success in link building and content strategies
* The ability to deploy an effective local and long-tail Keyword research strategy
* A deep understanding of mobile strategy and how it relates to SEO
* A solid grasp of how blogging, press releases, social media, and related strategies go hand-in-hand with SEO
* Experience in building inbound organic search traffic and improving SERPs
* A background in creating reports showing web analytics data and site evaluations
* An up-to-date, working knowledge of current, past, and projected trends in the SEO industry
* Familiarity with the best tools in the trade
* Someone hands on who also loves to dig into the detail and share bigger picture ideas

title: Digital Marketer
description:
**Role: Digital Marketing Specialist**

**Industry Type: Beauty Brand**

**Salary - Rs. 40000 - 60000 per month**

Job Type: Full Time

Education: Any Graduate

Experience: Minimum 2 Years

Location: Noida, NCR

Working Mode: Work From Office

**Job Description:**

As a Digital Marketing Specialist, you will create, execute, and manage paid acquisition campaigns. You will be responsible for analysing data to pull insights and inform decisions across all acquisition channels to boost growth.

**Roles and Responsibilities**

* Build and manage acquisition campaigns across various channels including social, SEM, and display to drive revenue and increase ROl.
* Identify marketing performance issues and pinpoint the root cause analysis with the help of analytics tools.
* Effectively communicate complicated analyses by developing easy-to-use reporting or visualization dashboards (demand funnel, marketing planning and budgeting, marketing ROl, operational efficiency, campaign impact, awareness, events, and strategic KPIs).
* Understand new and relevant KPI metrics requirements for performance management and optimization purposes.
* Work with creative and marketing teams to test strategies and innovation.
* Analyze and optimize campaign performance based on data-driven insights and strategy using quantitative analysis.
* Deliver quantifiable improvements in ROl, and cost per conversion (CPA) across all channels.

**Qualifications**

* Expertise in Facebook ads, Google ads, Amazon ads, Flipkart ads, etc.
* Previous work experience in a quantitative marketing role managing strategy and execution on social, search, or other performance-oriented channels.

**Expertise in analysing the data obtained from Website, Facebook insights, Google analytics**

* Proven track record of building and scaling acquisition campaigns with a strong focus on ROl and CAC.
* Deep understanding of data or data modeling and able to objectively identify insights for sharing with stakeholders.
* Exceptional analytical skills to identify opportunities within complex data and where these can be operationalized.
* Outstanding presentation skills.
* Excellent written and verbal communication skills.
* Strong project management skills.
* Critical thinker and creative.
* **Prior experience in beauty industry will be preferred**

Job Type: Full-time

Salary: ₹40,000.00 - ₹60,000.00 per month

Schedule:

* Day shift
* Fixed shift

Experience:

* Digital marketing: 1 year (Preferred)

Ability to Commute:
